name: Great Wyrm Gold Dragon
movement: walk 40 ft., fly 80 ft., swim 40 ft.
description: The Great Wyrm Gold Dragon has a majestic and imposing presence, with scales that shine like gold. It is gargantuan in size and possesses potent melee attacks alongside formidable spellcasting abilities.
memorable: It is known for its immense power, versatility in battle, and protective abilities that aid its allies.
goals: To protect its territory and allies while dispelling evil.
relations: Can be found with other dragons or noble creatures of the realm.
environment: High mountains, ancient ruins, and secluded forests.
strengths: Immunity to fire, high durability, and the ability to turn failed saving throws into successes.
weaknesses: Vulnerability to strategic spell use and ranged combat.
attacks: Powerful melee attacks with bite and claws, devastating breath weapons, and the ability to create hazardous zones with molten gold.
most_powerful_ability: Breath weapons that deal immense fire damage and can immobilize foes.
senses: It has blindsight out to 60 feet, granting it excellent awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Possesses exceptional persuasion skills, allowing it to manipulate allies and foes with ease.
additional_information: Gleaming Brilliance ability recharges breath weapon when bloodied.
Legendary Resistance enables it to succeed on saving throws.
Valor ability grants allies bonuses and immunities.
Can change shape into humanoid or beast form.
Legendary actions provide tactical advantages in combat.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting ability allows it to cast support spells like 'bless' and 'greater restoration' without material components.

majestic dragon immune to fire attacks
